SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class GoldCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.ColoredCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.GoldCard
public class GoldCard extends ColoredCard
Represents a gold card in the game. Extends the ColoredCard class and adds information about requirements and a function to calculate the score.

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(int id, Corner[] frontCorners, Resource backResource, Map<Resource,Integer> requirements, Function<Player,Integer> calculateScore, int score, String type)
      Constructor for the GoldCard class.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier of the card.
      frontCorners - Array of corners on the front side of the card.
      backResource - Resource on the back side of the card.
      requirements - Map of resource requirements for the card.
      calculateScore - Function to calculate the score based on the player.

      Getter for the type of the card.

      The String type of the card.

    • checkRequirements

      public boolean checkRequirements(Player player)
      Checks if the specified player meets the requirements to place this gold card. Returns true if the player satisfies all resource requirements specified for this card, otherwise returns false.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose resources are being checked against the card's requirements.
      Returns:
      True if the player meets the requirements, false otherwise.

    • getScore

      public Integer getScore(Player player)
      Calculates the score for the player based on the card's requirements using the strategy.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom the score is calculated.
      Returns:
      The calculated score.

    • getRequirements

      public ConcurrentHashMap<Resource,Integer> getRequirements()
      Retrieves the requirements for the card.
      Returns:
      The requirements for the card.
